node.statement: Establish functoriality and monotonicity. Show the assignment O -> tau_O^{>=*} is order-preserving: if O is a sub-transfer-system of O-prime (fewer transfers), then tau_{O}^{>=n} contains tau_{O-prime}^{>=n}. Verify boundary cases: O = complete transfer system recovers the standard HHR slice filtration; O = trivial (minimal) transfer system recovers a coarse filtration indexed by multiples of |G| where only H = G contributes.
